posts.title: Teen Heroes for the 21st Century
posts.text: The teenage comic book heroes of the '60s have grown up; Peter Parker isn’t an angst-ridden teen anymore—in the current series, he’s the CEO of a multi-national corporation. Now, to appeal to 21st century teens, Marvel and DC comics have created a new generation of teenage superheroes.
